Description: Clay tablet; complete; gift of real estate to the gods Hanish and Shullat; Larsa dynasty; repaired; salt encrustation?.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.233)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
